mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t where t.ORDERID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO ( ORDERID, ORDERSTATUS, COMPANYID, ORGID, ORGNAME, AREAID, AREANAME, I_YEAR, I_MONTH, I_SEASON, COMMITTIME, CASHDATE, PAYABLEAMT, PAYAMT, SALEAMT, DISCOUNTAMT, FULLCUTAMT, COUPONAMT, MALINGAMT, SIMPLEDISCOUNTAMT, REMARKS, PAYTYPECODE, PAYTYPENAME, CASHAMT, WXAMT, ALIPAYAMT, OTHERAMT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, PAYSTATUS, CASHTYPE, CASHTYPENAME, POINTAMT, POINT, CASHMANID, CASHMAN, GUIDERID, GUIDERNAME, VIPID, VIPNAME, VIPMOBILE, RECEIVETEL, RECEIVER, RECEIVEADDR, ORDERSTATUSNAME, COSTAMT, NUMS ) VALUES( #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.areaId:VARCHAR}, #{info.areaName:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_year:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_month:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_season:VARCHAR}, #{info.commitTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashDate:VARCHAR}, #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.saleAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.discountAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.fullCutAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.couponAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.malingAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.simpleDiscountAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, #{info.payTypeCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.payTypeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.wxAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.alipayAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.otherAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.payStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.cashType:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashTypeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.pointAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.point:NUMERIC}, #{info.cashManId:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashMan:VARCHAR}, #{info.guiderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.guiderName:VARCHAR}, #{info.vipId:VARCHAR}, #{info.vipName:VARCHAR}, #{info.vipMobile:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiveTel:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiver:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiveAddr:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderStatusName:VARCHAR}, #{info.costAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.nums:NUMERIC} )

INSERT INTO TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO ( ORDERID, ORDERSTATUS, COMPANYID, ORGID, ORGNAME, AREAID, AREANAME, I_YEAR, I_MONTH, I_SEASON, COMMITTIME, CASHDATE, PAYABLEAMT, PAYAMT, SALEAMT, DISCOUNTAMT, FULLCUTAMT, COUPONAMT, MALINGAMT, SIMPLEDISCOUNTAMT, REMARKS, PAYTYPECODE, PAYTYPENAME, CASHAMT, WXAMT, ALIPAYAMT, OTHERAMT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, PAYSTATUS, CASHTYPE, CASHTYPENAME, POINTAMT, POINT, CASHMANID, CASHMAN, GUIDERID, GUIDERNAME, VIPID, VIPNAME, VIPMOBILE, RECEIVETEL, RECEIVER, RECEIVEADDR, ORDERSTATUSNAME, COSTAMT, NUMS ) VALUES
( #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.areaId:VARCHAR}, #{info.areaName:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_year:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_month:VARCHAR}, #{info.i_season:VARCHAR}, #{info.commitTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashDate:VARCHAR}, #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.saleAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.discountAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.fullCutAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.couponAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.malingAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.simpleDiscountAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, #{info.payTypeCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.payTypeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.wxAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.alipayAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.otherAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.payStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.cashType:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashTypeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.pointAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.point:NUMERIC}, #{info.cashManId:VARCHAR}, #{info.cashMan:VARCHAR}, #{info.guiderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.guiderName:VARCHAR}, #{info.vipId:VARCHAR}, #{info.vipName:VARCHAR}, #{info.vipMobile:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiveTel:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiver:VARCHAR}, #{info.receiveAddr:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderStatusName:VARCHAR}, #{info.costAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.nums:NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO SET ORDERSTATUS = #{info.orderStatus:NUMERIC}, COMPANYID = #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{info.orgId:VARCHAR}, ORGNAME = #{info.orgName:VARCHAR}, AREAID = #{info.areaId:VARCHAR}, AREANAME = #{info.areaName:VARCHAR}, I_YEAR = #{info.i_year:VARCHAR}, I_MONTH = #{info.i_month:VARCHAR}, I_SEASON = #{info.i_season:VARCHAR}, COMMITTIME = #{info.commitTime:VARCHAR}, CASHDATE = #{info.cashDate:VARCHAR}, PAYABLEAMT = #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, PAYAMT = #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, SALEAMT = #{info.saleAmt:VARCHAR}, DISCOUNTAMT = #{info.discountAmt:VARCHAR}, FULLCUTAMT = #{info.fullCutAmt:VARCHAR}, COUPONAMT = #{info.couponAmt:VARCHAR}, MALINGAMT = #{info.malingAmt:VARCHAR}, SIMPLEDISCOUNTAMT = #{info.simpleDiscountAmt:VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{info.remarks:VARCHAR}, PAYTYPECODE = #{info.payTypeCode:VARCHAR}, PAYTYPENAME = #{info.payTypeName:VARCHAR}, CASHAMT = #{info.cashAmt:VARCHAR}, WXAMT = #{info.wxAmt:VARCHAR}, ALIPAYAMT = #{info.alipayAmt:VARCHAR}, OTHERAMT = #{info.otherAmt:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, PAYSTATUS = #{info.payStatus:NUMERIC}, CASHTYPE = #{info.cashType:VARCHAR}, CASHTYPENAME = #{info.cashTypeName:VARCHAR}, POINTAMT = #{info.pointAmt:VARCHAR}, POINT = #{info.point:NUMERIC}, CASHMANID = #{info.cashManId:VARCHAR}, CASHMAN = #{info.cashMan:VARCHAR}, GUIDERID = #{info.guiderId:VARCHAR}, GUIDERNAME = #{info.guiderName:VARCHAR}, VIPID = #{info.vipId:VARCHAR}, VIPNAME = #{info.vipName:VARCHAR}, VIPMOBILE = #{info.vipMobile:VARCHAR}, RECEIVETEL = #{info.receiveTel:VARCHAR}, RECEIVER = #{info.receiver:VARCHAR}, RECEIVEADDR = #{info.receiveAddr:VARCHAR}, ORDERSTATUSNAME = #{info.orderStatusName:VARCHAR}, COSTAMT = #{info.costAmt:VARCHAR}, NUMS = #{info.nums:NUMERIC} WHERE ORDERID = #{info.orderId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t WHERE t.ORDERID=#{orderId}

DELETE FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO WHERE ORDERID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_ORDER_INFO t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.ORDERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ORGNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.AREAID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.AREANAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.I_YEAR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.I_MONTH LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.I_SEASON LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.COMMITTIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHDATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.REMARKS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYTYPECODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYTYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.WXAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ALIPAYAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.OTHERAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CREATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHTYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHTYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.POINTAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHMANID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CASHMAN LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GUIDERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GUIDERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.VIPID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.VIPNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.VIPMOBILE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVETEL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVEADDR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
